abstract: United States District Court Judge Jon S Tigar dismisses lawsuit by Yelp shareholders who claimed they had been fraudulently misled about authenticity and quality of its reviews.
lead_paragraph: Yelp won the dismissal of a lawsuit by shareholders who claimed they had been fraudulently misled about the authenticity and quality of its reviews.

headline.main: Judge Dismisses Yelp Suit Brought by Shareholders
headline.print_headline: Judge Dismisses Yelp Suit Brought by Shareholders

snippet: Yelp won the dismissal of a lawsuit by shareholders who claimed they had been fraudulently misled about the authenticity and quality of its reviews.
